div.head: TO THE RIGHT HONORABLE SIR EDWARD COOKE Knight, Lord chiefe Iustice of the Common Pleas.
MATHEW STONEHAM Minister, wisheth the accomplishment of all his godly desires.

closer.signed: Your Lordships poore orator, M. STONEHAM.
